languages.text: Imperial world characters can select any {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}) and add a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
languages.original_text: Персонаж с имперского мира может выбрать любую {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристику{/g} (кроме {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g}) и добавить к ней {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +10.

traits.locale_text: Imperial world characters can select any characteristic (except for Weapon or Ballistic Skill) and add a +10 bonus.

Imperial world characters can select any {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}) and add a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

Imperial world characters can select any {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}) and add a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

languages.text: Charaktere einer imperialen Welt können eine beliebige {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaft{/g} wählen (außer {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}) und einen +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} hinzufügen.
languages.original_text: Imperial world characters can select any {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}) and add a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Charaktere einer imperialen Welt können eine beliebige Eigenschaft wählen (außer Waffenfähigkeit oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistische Fähigkeit{/g}) und einen +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} hinzufügen.

languages.text: Les personnages des mondes impériaux peuvent choisir n'importe quelle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} (à l'exception de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}) et y ajouter un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +10.
languages.original_text: Imperial world characters can select any {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}) and add a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les personnages des mondes impériaux peuvent choisir n'importe quelle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} (à l'exception de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}) et y ajouter un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +10.

Les personnages des mondes impériaux peuvent choisir n'importe quelle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} (à l'exception de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence Arme{/g} et de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de Tir{/g}) et y ajouter un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +10.

languages.text: 帝国世界的角色可以选择任意{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}（除了{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}），使此项属性获得+10效果。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}
languages.original_text: Imperial world characters can select any {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}) and add a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 帝国世界的角色可以选择任意属性（除了武器技能与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}），使此项属性获得+10效果。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}

languages.text: Los personajes de mundos Imperiales pueden elegir cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g} (excepto {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}) y añadirle una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +10.
languages.original_text: Imperial world characters can select any {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}) and add a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los personajes de mundos Imperiales pueden elegir cualquier característica (excepto Habilidad de armas y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}) y añadirle una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +10.

languages.text: インペリアルワールドのキャラクターは、いずれかの{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}を選択することができ（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}を除く）、それに+10の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を加える。
languages.original_text: Imperial world characters can select any {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}) and add a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: インペリアルワールドのキャラクターは、いずれかの能力を選択することができ（武器または{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}を除く）、それに+10の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を加える。

languages.text: Персонаж с имперского мира может выбрать любую {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристику{/g} (кроме {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g}) и добавить к ней {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +10.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж из имперского мира может выбрать любую характеристику (кроме {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g}) и добавить к ней {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +10.

Персонаж из имперского мира может выбрать любую характеристику (кроме {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g}) и добавить к ней {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +10.

languages.text: İmparatorluk dünyası karakterleri herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliği{/g} seçip ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} hariç) ona +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} ekleyebilir.
